title: "Neon Robot Dreams"
content:
# Neon Robot Dreams

Welcome to Neon Robot Dreams, a website dedicated to all things retro-futuristic. Our love for the past and the future collide in this neon-lit space where vintage illustrations of robots come to life.

Explore our collection of wallpapers featuring various robots from different eras and styles. From classic sci-fi robots to modern-day mechs, we have it all. Our wallpapers are perfect for adding a touch of nostalgia and futurism to your desktop or mobile device.

In addition to our wallpapers, we also offer a selection of merchandise featuring our favorite retro-futuristic designs. From t-shirts to phone cases, show off your love for robots and neon colors with our unique products.

Join us on this journey through time and space as we celebrate the beauty of retro-futurism.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A retro-futuristic wallpaper featuring a vintage illustration of a robot, set against a neon-colored background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
